description: Casual timezone references ('3 PM their time', '9 AM his time'). Two international calls: London team Tuesday 10 AM local, Tokyo sync Wednesday 7 PM local.

events.title: London Team Video Call
events.reasoning: Alice and Carol agree to a video call with the London team on Tuesday at 10 AM local time (3 PM London time).

events.title: Tokyo API Sync with Dave
events.reasoning: Dave from the Tokyo office requested a 30-minute sync on Wednesday at 9 AM Tokyo time, which is 7 PM local time. Alice and Carol both confirmed.

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 2 events: London team call Tuesday 10 AM, Tokyo sync Wednesday 7 PM.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'Tuesday' is 2026-02-24 and 'Wednesday' is 2026-02-25. Times are already converted to local time by the speakers. Relaxed tolerance due to timezone ambiguity.
